ygData.subject: Re: Buying and Selling Songs
ygData.msgSnippet: Well that s odd. LiseraLute is a lore item that is not asterisked and I cannot drop or trade that. Could it be that things are... *gasp* inconsistent? Good
ygData.messageBody:
Well that's odd. LiseraLute is a lore item that is not asterisked and I
cannot drop or trade that. Could it be that things are... *gasp*
inconsistent?

Good Journey,

Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)


-----Original Message-----
From: Snicker [mailto:snicker@...]
Sent: Friday, May 14, 1999 11:37 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Buying and Selling Songs


From: Snicker <snicker@...>

At 08:23 PM 5/14/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Kyle" <ksibbald@...>
>
> A lore item only checks to see if you have another instance in your
>inventory. When you scribe the song it is no longer a scroll so, yes, you
>could buy-scribe-buy. You might have problems getting rid of the second
one,
>though, since lore items cannot be dropped or traded.

Not true - Lore items can be dropped and traded - it's certain asterisk'd
items that can't be.


Talies on Bristlebane
